title: Practice Challenge
description: Practice using comments! Add a single-line comment above the console.log explaining what the code does. Then, comment out the second console.log (so it doesn't run) using //.
instructions: Practice using comments! Add a single-line comment above the console.log explaining what the code does. Then, comment out the second console.log (so it doesn't run) using //.

testCases.description: Only the first message is displayed

hints.text: Put // at the beginning of the line you want to comment out.

commonMistakes.consequence: This can lead to errors or unexpected behavior.

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting the space after //: While //comment works, // comment is more readable.
commonMistakes.consequence: This can lead to errors or unexpected behavior.
commonMistakes.correction: Forgetting the space after //: While //comment works, // comment is more readable.

commonMistakes.mistake: Trying to nest multi-line comments: /* /* nested */ */ doesn't work. Once the computer sees */, it thinks the comment is over.
commonMistakes.consequence: This can lead to errors or unexpected behavior.
commonMistakes.correction: Trying to nest multi-line comments: /* /* nested */ */ doesn't work. Once the computer sees */, it thinks the comment is over.
